item.title: July 14, 2018 --- Quote of the Week: -------------- "Behind every great man, is a woman rolling her eyes. (Jim Carrey)"
Be sure to unplug the power from your internet modem for 2 minutes and restart to help your box run faster.
Box Updates: There is a new update being rolled out this month for improved performance. If you have not received the update, Call or text us at (440) 703-0093 to schedule your update for your box.
